name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"b3e69a08-1ddb-4010-ac06-a36070acaff3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: helper","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7a6f0815-2c3f-480f-8c3b-ba9f31c176c2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"helper","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a specialized string-parsing utility nested within ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Its job is to take a potentially complex namespace string (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.submodule.Class.instance.attribute","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and break it down into two parts: a "stable" root that the analyzer already recognizes, and a list of remaining attribute names that still need to be resolved. It accomplishes this by "climbing" up the namespace hierarchy, stripping off sections from right to left until it finds a valid, non-placeholder definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"322008c9-24dc-4822-bb0b-db2b2a47c0aa","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static resolution of deep attributes is difficult because not every part of a dotted string corresponds to a scope. In ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_app.utils.config.timeout","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_app.utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a module, but ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"config","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" might be a class instance, and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"timeout","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a variable. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"helper","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" identifies where the "known" structure ends and the "dynamic" attribute access begins, allowing the parent ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function to resolve each subsequent piece using the correct logic for that specific type of object.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f591c956-347f-4608-ae57-027787a87afb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f7c7c582-be5e-42ea-a667-4080c7e35f82","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Initial Check:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It looks up the full namespace in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". If it finds a solid definition (like a specific function or module), it's done.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"364a04f1-1a5a-46b3-9e95-8b938bf51c34","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Namespace Stripping:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the current string is unknown or is a placeholder/temporary definition (like a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PARAM_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"RETURN_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it enters a loop:","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"5a967358-8d0c-4f45-8e7a-e9d35f40033e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It finds the last dot (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") in the string.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"81e816c2-2377-46c4-bc44-6d9acf364cbc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It takes everything after the dot (the "right" side) and adds it to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"rightList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ac08adf8-fd24-474f-adc8-28abf81f0129","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It truncates the string to the part before the dot (the "left" side).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d4829895-fd03-43ed-a7fa-4a00f5e16029","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" again for this shorter string.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"630ed0bf-4b73-4f2d-a7bd-3fd8017d78ee","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Stability Anchor:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It continues this process until it hits a definition that it considers a reliable starting point.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ace89a3d-8c57-44a2-907e-5a3368a6e677","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Output:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It returns a list containing the shortened root namespace and the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"rightList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" containing all the attributes that were stripped off.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2f950ec0-9e70-4692-97ae-f5a5e8884a9c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Input: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.services.auth.current_user.permissions","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ddb380b2-511d-47ad-b4b1-ce63d81a012f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analyzer checks the full string—no definition found.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"34baba9d-fa54-4459-a6c0-56df3ebcbcf0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"helper","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" strips ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".permissions","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"rightList = [".permissions"]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"99e34e66-70aa-44f2-809e-572c34bccf52","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analyzer checks ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.services.auth.current_user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"—this is a function parameter (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PARAM_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), so it's not a stable root.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c8243020-4fc3-4a7e-b3db-1cc6c2f38fa3","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"helper","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" strips ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".current_user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"rightList = [".current_user", ".permissions"]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f26cfb5a-5792-482c-81d0-904907f73f32","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analyzer checks ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.services.auth","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This is a known Module (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"MOD_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eb456766-9fa0-4d50-a19a-70adad89fb0f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Success:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"["app.services.auth"]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as the root and the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"rightList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of attributes to be resolved one-by-one.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f0f4f836-3d22-433f-adc4-bac30b184779","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
